name.en: Special Topics in Integrated Design for Smart Products

description.zh: 本課程介紹最新理論、方法與工具的設計實務應用，以及使用者、科技與商業的跨領域整合，以提升學生在策略層次上的設計概念化和具體化能力。內容包括一套整合創新設計理論方法、美學、人因、工程與永續的研發路數。學生將於智慧產品設計案中演練跨領域應用研究所需的知識技能。
description.en: This course focuses on teaching conceptualization and embodiment design for best practice of industrial design by applying state-of-the-art theories and methodologies, and by integrating user, technology and business aspects. At a strategic level, it provides an integrated approach to the advanced studies in innovative design theory and methods, aesthetics, ergonomics, engineering, and sustainability. Multidisciplinary applied research is embedded in a smart product project.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解施工安全衛生的重要，熟悉有關知識及緊急措施，從而增加處變之因應能力。內容包括施工安全衛生組織，事故調查分析，風險評估與安全管理，施工安全和衛生設備，安全經費編列與執行，新穎的風險評估及安全管理方法與研究等。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the students the concept of the importance of construction safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of construction safety, analysis of accidents, risk assessment and safety management, construction safety and facilities, safety outlay and implementation, current research and novel techniques for risk assessment and safety management and so on.

description.zh: 山坡地開發、規劃與施工，高樑建築基礎施工與監測，水庫工程之調查與規劃，捷運系統規劃、調查與施工。
description.en: 英課名：The geography engineering case analyze        To open up and develop mountain slope, plan and         construction.        Base construction and to monitor of high beam         building.        Investigate and plan of reservoir engineering.        A rapid transit system plan, investigate and         construction.

description.zh: 本課程針對不同應用主題，諸如人事、財務、物料安全、品質、進度、環保等進行管理科學之介紹，並進行應用研究探討，此外有關作業研究、系統模擬等分析方法亦將於課程中詳加介紹。
description.en: This cause will introduce the management science and application of personnel, finance, safety, material, quality,schedule and environmental protection. Meanwhile,the analysis methods of activity research and system simulation will also be dicussed.

description.zh: 近年發生之福島核災、印度新德里爆炸案等各種天然及人為災害已顯著影響到人類的生活品質與安全。本課程目標有三：(1)了解各種災害形成原因及環境背景因素；(2)評估災害對社會、環境及人類之影響及因應措施；(3)新穎技術可擴大環境監測尺度並預警災害。較為代表性之災害會於課堂中案例講述，加深同學學習印象。工程背景較為薄弱之學生，亦適合選修此課程。學習成效：學生可獲得：(1)	災害管理內涵與重要觀念。(2)	評估災害風險與危機管理。(3)	研擬災前的災後復原重建計畫。
description.en: The recurrent occurrences of various natural and manmade disasters like the December 2004 Tsunami, the bomb blasts in the cinema halls of Delhi and many such incidences have diverted our focus towards safety of one’s own life. The goals of this course are three-fold: (1) To educate students about the underlying natural process that give rise to hazards. (2) To emphasize how society evaluates and confronts the dangers posed by these natural processes from a political, social, and ethical perspective. (3) Expose students to the technological innovations that are allowing an increasing large human population to monitor, predict, and warn society about natural hazards and impending disasters. Case studies of recent and past natural disasters will be discussed. This course is designed for students without an extensive background in science or math and can be used to partly satisfy minor programs in Environmental Geosciences.Learning Outcomes: Upon completion of this course, students will

notes: 土木大三大四與防災所合開/研究所15人

description.zh: 本課程介紹近代電化學的分析方法。 介紹內容包含電位法、循環伏安法、安培法、光譜電化學法、旋轉環碟電極法、及其他近代電化學的分析方法。
description.en: Introduction the principles and applications of modern electroanalytical methods. Introduction the theory and application of polarography, potentiometry, cyclic voltammetry, Amperometry, spectroelectrochemistry, RRDE, and other modern electroanalytical techniques.

name.zh: 綠能產業政策與經濟分析
name.en: Industrial Policy of Green Energy and Economic Analysis

description.zh: 在推動國家經濟發展，提升環境保護和創造國家競爭力，政府對於科技政策之擬定，及科技經費之持續支持十分重要，並以此培植科技人才、將科技研發成果加以推廣。為確保有限之科技資源能夠發揮其最高之效用，建立客觀及公正之績效評估制度實屬必要。本課程擬以最近影響人類生活環境甚巨之全球暖化現象( Global Warming )，及其引發之綠能科技投資為例，探討綠能科技政策之擬訂，以及綠能產業經濟分析。綠色能源包括風能、太陽能、生質能、氫能與燃料電池、地熱能、海洋能與淨煤技術，發展綠能產業即具備「3E」平衡發展之功效，已成各國追求之目標。本課程預計將涵蓋以下主題：�X替代能源介紹（包括生質能源，如生質柴油與酒精汽油，以及氫能與燃料電池等）�X再生能源介紹（包括太陽能、風能、水力發電、地熱及海洋能等）�X二氧化碳捕捉與封存、淨煤專題�XLED專題等
description.en: Many scientists conclude that the increased greenhouse effect is already accelerating global warming and leading to the climate change. Worldwide government are taking measures to tackle this issue and outlining strategies to bring the greenhouse effect under control.Greenhouse gas emissions in Taiwan are mainly from burning fossil fuels such as crude oil, coal and LPG and the energy imports have reached 99.22%. Therefore, the sustainable development in any country is to increase the proportion of self-generation of energy, reduce the emission of GHGs, and balance among Economic Growth, Environment Protection and Energy Supply.Green energy (Renewable energy) covers the fields of solar and wind energy, biofuels which includes biodiesel and bioethanol, hydrogen energy and fuel cell, geothermal and ocean energy as well as clean coal combustion technologies (IGCC). Balancing development of '3E' can be achieved by developing green energy industries and which is also the goal every count

description.zh: 本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
description.en: The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.

name.zh: 分子模擬於化學工程之應用
name.en: Molecular simulation and its applications in chemical engineering

description.zh: 本課程目標學生為各實驗室專題生及研究生。短程目標為介紹分子模擬之基礎，使同學透過分子和原子層級的觀點，重新理解手邊實驗觀察的成果，以增加對本身研究結果的認知。長期目標是透過課程所提出且完成之研究題目，向自己指導教授提出計畫書。經指導教授核可後，再與授課老師合作完成該項跨領域研究，和其本身的實驗研究結果結合，可望發表在更頂尖的期刊上。
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce students of different backgrounds the basic skills of molecular simulation for them to formulate computational study in their own research area. Students who are willing to take this course should work on an active research project (Master’s thesis or undergraduate research in their junior and senior year) and should have their advisor’s consent.

description.zh: 本課程介紹管理會計和控制等之成本會計概念介紹，本課程之目的在了解管理會計之實務與應用內涵，並藉以設計及發展管理資訊系統另外，本課程也針對與管會相關之介紹(just-in-time, balanced scorecards, profitability center, investment center …等)與管理決策(外包或自製, 增加產品線,績效評估…等)
description.en: This course deals with management accounting and control both within a micro-behavioural and within an organisational theory perspective. The aim is to provide an understanding of the developments in management accounting and control theory and practice and the implications of critical variables that affect the design, development and operation of management accounting and control systems. Practical aspects of management accounting are mainly examined through computer assisted learning (CAL). Students are expected to cover the prescribed reading on their own, and to perceive the taught seminars as the opportunity to ask questions and to offer their views at any time.

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於幫助學生瞭解財務決策的理論架構，主要著重於介紹財務管理的基本原理，以及其如何運用在財務經理所面對的主要決策上。希望學生於修習本課程後，能瞭解各種財務管理的工具，並能有效率地使用於投資與融資決策上。
description.en: This course is to build up the financial framework for students when making financial decisions. The focus is on setting out the basic principles of financial management and applying them to the main decisions faced by the financial managers. It helps students to understand various tools of financial management and use them effectively when making investment and financing decisions.

description.zh: 本課程專門設置了兩個主要的構面，課程規劃著重於培育未來之企業領導與管理人才與而設置。全球化的競爭使得各專業領域之企業領導者面臨益加複雜之企業決策，高階主管面臨"兩難" 甚至"多難"的多元選擇情況下，企業目標與經濟決策時常產生衝突，”倫理”的議題因此成為當今高階管理之重要課題之一！ 再者，本課程第二個構面為策略管理，透過教導策略目標的擬定、執行、組織結構以及如何因應組織內外部環境的轉變能帶給IMBA課程之年青學子多項關鍵之能力，同時，配合個案，學生們也將學習有關策略思考之分析架構，組織管理與併購和多角化議題等方面相關管理能力之建構。
description.en: More than ever, business leaders are facing even more challenges in the turbulence environment, not just economic aspects but also legal and ethical aspects. Two important parts are introduced in IMBA program, which is business ethics and strategic management. The purpose in this course is specifically designed for developing future leaders for corporations & organizations in various business domains. How to simultaneously achieve the corporate objectives and fulfill the ethical responsibilities without compromising fundamental principles and standards of conduct when facing dilemma is imperative for us to learn and ponder upon. Moreover, the topic in strategic management integrates cutting-edge research on topics including competitive advantage, corporate governance, diversification, strategic leadership, technology and innovation, and corporate social responsibility through both theory and case studies. With this vision and mission in mind, the lecturer is committed to inspire the st

description.zh: 本課程將先從隨機變數的內容開始並主要介紹消息理論的基礎與應用。本課程的將涵蓋下列內容：    (1) 熵值，相對性熵值與互訊息    (2) 漸近等分理論    (3) 隨機程序的熵速率    (4) 資料壓縮    (5) 消息理論與賭博    (6) 頻道容量    (7) 差別熵值    (8) 高斯通道
description.en: This class starts from the review of random process and mainly provides an introduction to information theory. The following is a rough description of the material covered in this class.    (1) Entropy, Relative Entropy, and Mutual information    (2) Asymptotic equipartition theorem    (3) Entropy rates of stochastic processes    (4) Data compression (Huffman coding, Shannon codes, Kraftinequality, etc.)    (5) Information theory and gambling    (6) Channel Capacity    (7) Differential entropy    (8) Gaussian Channels

notes: 電機所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Clustering Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

notes: 電機所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 本課程以深入淺出之方式，介紹與機器學習之相關技術及演算法，目標是修習本課程之學生具有閱讀機器學習相關文獻之基本知識，並能從事相關之實務或電腦模擬實驗之工作，因此本課程著重在廣泛介紹各類之演算法之應用，而非深究少數演算法之深奧數學原理．本課程涵蓋之演算法，包含：最佳化基本知識，隨機最佳化演算法，隨機搜尋，決策樹，隨機森林，類神經網路及深度學習相關演算法，基因演算法，貝氏定理及應用，高斯混合模型，隱藏式馬可夫鍊(及訓練演算法，支援向量機，線性及邏輯回歸，分群方法，降維方法，提升方法，決策融合技巧，及增強式學習等．
description.en: This introductory course covers most of the techniques and algorithms related to the current trend in the machine learning field. The goal of this course is that students complete this course can read and understand the literature in the machine learning field, and can conduct computer simulations for experiments or apply the techniques to practical problems. Therefore, this course intends to cover a broad range of algorithms with emphasis on applications, rather than to cover only a few algorithms with extensive mathematical treatments. The algorithms covered in this course include: foundations of optiminizations, random search, decision tree,  random decision forests, neural networks and deep learning, genetic algorithm, Bayes' theorem and its applications, Gauss mixture model, hidden Markov model (with its training algorithm), support vector machine, linear and logistic regressions, clustering algorithms, dimension reduction techniques (LDA, PCA, ICA, FA), boosting methods, decision

notes: 四資四、資工所與電資外生所合開、限20人

name.en: Principles and Applications of Data Science

description.zh: 資料科學探索如何從大量、多元、非結構化的資料中發掘有價值的資訊，並有效提供相關的應用策略，探討的層面包括：資料處理及計算、資料儲存、數理統計及資料分析技術與應用等。本課程討論此一領域的進展，並使學生了解相關知識與技術工具，進而具備資料科學思維及應用能力。課程內容以廣度為主，主題包含資料管理、資料分析、資料視覺化、機器學習、深度學習，巨量資料等。
description.en: Data science explores how to produce or create the valuable information and knowledge from large, multi-typed, or unstructured data and provides effective feedbacks to applications. It is integrative cross data processing and computing, data storage, statistics and probability, linear algebra, and skills of data analysis. This course introduces this rapidly growing field, discusses the state-of-art techniques, and provides students with the fundamental related knowledge as well as the ability to use software tools. The training of this course is toward equipping students with the general mindset and the ability to solve problems practically with the learned techniques. The course will be given on breadth, rather than depth, and its topics include data management, data analysis, data visualization, machine learning, deep learning, big data, etc.

notes: 四資四、資工所與電資外生所合開

name.zh: 計算生物學及醫學資訊

description.zh: 本課程主要教授與計算生物學及醫學資訊學相關之重要主題。 學生能夠了解如何正確分析生物和醫學數據所衍伸的問題及應用。 希望透過課程協助同學了解和學習如何組裝基因體資料和醫學數據分析中經常使用的演算法技術內容，閱讀最新相關生醫技術論文及使用開放工具，增進實際操作之經驗或自行建構分析生醫相關資料之應用系統。
description.en: This course is designed to provide important topics in computational biology and medical informatics. Students are able to learn about problems involved in the generation and analysis of biological and medical data. The course intends to provide good understanding of the commonly used algorithms and public tools in the analysis of genomic and medical data, to read updated scientific reports, and to increase hands-on experiences with accessing and using relevant databases.

notes: 四資四、資工所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 1.數位視訊的表示法 2.畫面內編碼 3.JPEC與JPEG2000 4.動作補償與畫面間編碼 5.視訊傳輸之漸進式編碼與強健性 6.合成影像之編碼7.多媒體資料索引與檢索8.智慧財產權的保護：浮水印與其他９.MPEG標準
description.en: 1.Representations of Digital Video2.Intraframe Coding3.JPEG and JPEG 2000Standards4.Motion Compensation and Interframe Coding5.Content-BasedScalability and Robustness of Video   Transmission6.Coding of Synthetic Video7.Multimedia Indexing and Retrieval8.IP Protection Techniques:watermarking and others9.MPEG Standards

notes: 資工所與電資外生所合開

description.zh: 網路搜尋已經成為最受歡迎的應用之一. 資訊檢索主要在探討如何有效的在大量文字及多媒體文件中搜尋使用者想要的資訊. 本課程將介紹資訊檢索的基本觀念, 檢索模型, 文字資訊檢索, 檢索結果評估, 索引與搜尋, 以及其他多媒體檢索相關應用
description.en: With the expansion of the World Wide Web (WWW), Web search has become one of the most popular applications. Information retrieval (IR) is a research field that targets at effectively and efficiently searching information in huge amounts of text and multimedia documents. In this course, we will introduce the basic models, text IR, retrieval evaluation, indexing and searching, and applications for IR.Outline:1. Overview of Information Retrieval2. Modeling3. Retrieval Evaluation4. Text IR5. Query Languages and Operations6. Indexing and Searching7. Applications for IR8. Web Search

notes: 四資四、資工所與電資外生所合開

name.zh: 建築資訊模型與防救災及工程管理
name.en: Applications of Building Information Modeling for Disaster Prevention and Engineering Management

description.zh: 本課程將以BIM之觀點，介紹國內外建築資訊模型及建築資訊模型案例，包含建築資訊模型及探討BIM之設計與實作，希望學生能夠經由防救災或工程管理之需求分析開始，瞭解BIM建築資訊系統之架構與應用，進而設計一個BIM在防救災與管理之實務應用，其內容包括：BIM自動化防救災應用，BIM實務應用，國內外BIM案例探討，BIM應用之分析與設計，BIM系統設計與開發，BIM系統在防救災與工程管理之應用等內容。
description.en: Building Information Modeling (BIM) is increasingly important for applications disaster prevention and management recently. The course introduces the BIM use, modeling, design, development, and related applications for disaster prevention and engineering management. The course is a combination of lectures, readings, hands-on exercises, homework assignments, a midterm report and a final project. The course allows students to develop a BIM-related applications suitable to their own researches to meet disaster prevention or engineering management requirement.

description.zh: 本課程係以時間為軸，將台灣建築區分為七個文化期，依次概略介紹各文化期建築的一般特徵：(1) 臺灣建築史學史、分期及資料體系、(2) 史前建築：舊石器時代與新石器時代的建築、(3) 南島族群的建築：高山族的建築、(4) 南島族群的建築：平埔族的建築、(5) 荷西建築、(6) 漢式建築、(7) 清末洋式建築、(8) 日式建築、(9) 現代建築。
description.en: This course is based on historical development of architectures, actually Taiwan have seven cultural times, this course will introduce every topical of architectures, as followers：historical studies of Taiwan Architectures, early historical architecture, architectures of high mountain peoples, architectures of lower mountain peoples, architectures from Nederland and Spain, architectures from China, architectures from Europe, Japanese architectures, and modern architectures.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與EMBA學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發EMBA學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange the ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: 碩二106級必修(台北校區為主)

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

description.zh: 隨著雲端運算服務的廣為使用及網際網路服務的發展，我們已經處於大數據時代，如何處理與儲存大數據、如何從大數據中，探勘有用的知識，成為近年來熱門的研究議題。本課程內容尚包括如何處理與分析大數據、如何更進一步從大數據分析發展市場行銷與顧客關係管理策略，大數據各種案例實務探討等。
description.en: With the development of cloud computing services and Internet services, it has generated a very huge amount of data. How to handle and store these big data and how to mine useful knowledge from big data have become the popular research topics. The contents of this course also include how to handle and store big data, and how to develop marketing and customer relationship management strategies thru big data analysis, and various big data practices and case studies.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 單自由度系統的自由及強制振動，多自由度統的自由及強制振動，自然頻率的計算與模態分析，連續體的振動，振動的控制，振動系統之數值分析方法，非線性振動及隨機振動
description.en: Topics include Free and Forced vibrations of single degree and multidegree of freedom systems, Determination of natural frequencies and mode shapes, Vibration of continuous systems, Vibration control, Numerical methods in vibration analysis, Nonlinear vibration and Random vibration.

description.zh: 本課程以介紹複合動力車輛概念、設計、能量分析及最佳化控制為主，結合內燃機及馬達兩種複合動力之能量管理及配合道路狀況，教導學生熟識複合車輛動力系統。
description.en: This course presents fundamentals of Hybrid Electric Vehicles: HEV concepts and design, energy analysis, unified modeling approach, optimization and control.  The power consumption side of vehicles. Conventional power generation: IC engine overview, concepts of hybridization, general model of energy form and energy flows, on-board energy storage (fuels and batteries). Overview of electrochemical converters: motors, transmissions for HEVs, principles of fuel cells, HEV application. Principles of energy optimization in HEVs.

description.zh: 本課程將以車輛之傳動系統設計與分析為主要內容，傳動系統之定義為從動力源至驅動輪間之各項組合，其中包括離合器、加力箱、變速箱、差速箱、傳動軸與最終傳動等組合，由於每種車輛行車特性之不同，因此前述之各項組合有不同之排列方式，傳動系統設計之優劣往往影響到車輛之行車性能。本課程將從車輛行駛阻力推演出傳統系統設計之理念及方法，並針對如何發揮動力源之最佳特性，搭配良好之傳動系統設計以達到較佳之行車性能為主要教學之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the vehicle drive-train design and analysis. Topics include definition for drive-train system、clutches、transfer case、manual transmission、automatic transmission、differential gear、transmission shaft  and final driver.  Fundamentals of vehicle tractive resistance will deduce the methodology of drive-train design.  The good drive-train design will result in optimal vehicle tractive performance.

name.en: The Symbols and Interpretation in Films

description.zh: 課程旨通過對電影的討論與分析，得以進入隱喻、符號、作者論、窺視／凝視、時間與記憶、聲音、電影現象學等論述的理解，並在過程中，探討電影與社會，乃至於與個體生命之間的意義與議題。
description.en: This course aims to study the theories, analysis methods and discussions over the concerns in film studies, including metaphors, symbols, auteur theory, voyeurism/ gaze, temporality and memory, sound, and film phenomenology. With the tutor-led discussions and screenings, we will explore the significances between the cinema and the society, or the cinema and individuals.

description.zh: 歷史想像讓人可以掙脫現實世界，縱橫遨遊於歷史之海。本課程學習相關歷史，培養學生利用本地文化為素材，學習文化相關創作、鑑賞的基礎知識。現代人對影像敏銳度很高，藉由「影視史學」的圖像與影像的引領，使修課同學瞭解各地不同的歷史發展、生活樣貌與思考模式。以活潑的史實，引領同學多面向的思考，理解多元價值的真諦。
description.en: Historical imagination can release us from the bonds and limits of reality by giving us various perspectives of ideas, values and patterns of life over times. Now through the media of film, a powerful recorder of life and events, this course intends to equip students with an ability to appreciate a film as a cultural and historical text so as to seek the presence of historical phenomena and sociological significance. Vivid cases of film evidence will be presented to inspire students to interpret and reevaluate the great historical issues of the times so that they can understand the true essence of many values and foster the capacity of multi-dimensional thinking.

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1.簡介；2.電子商店的行銷策略；3.電子商店的建 置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6.案例介紹；7.結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion。

name.zh: 智慧製造執行系統演練
name.en: Practice of Intelligent Manufacturing Execution System

description.zh: 製造執行系統(MES)在產品從工單發出到成品產出的過程中，扮演生產活動最佳化的資訊傳遞者。MES運用即時、準確的資訊，指導、執行、回應並記錄工廠活動，從而能夠對條件的變化做出迅速的回應、減少無附加價值的活動、提高工廠運作過程的效率。MES不但可以改善設備投資報酬率，而且有助於及時交貨、加快庫存周轉、提高收益和現金流的績效，MES在企業和供應鏈間，以雙向交互的形式提供生產活動的基礎資訊。本課程將介紹MES概念及基本功能，並透過模擬與實作來讓學生了解MES之特性。
description.en: Manufacturing Execution System (MES) is the major information exchange portal of product records from order releasing to shipping. With real time data, MES allocates, implements, and responses to fulfill the production plans rapidly and at the same time improves the resource utilization by limiting non-value added activities. The benefit of using MES includes better performance in equipment ROI, on-time delivery, inventory turn-over rate, and hence higher revenue and cash-flow. Data collected by MES is served as the communication venue within the supply chain. This course focuses on the concept and basic functions of MES through simulation sections and practical cases.

description.zh: 先修課程：動態分析與模擬或負責教授同意。  非線性系統現象介紹，參數影響及應用模擬方法，數值分析及案例研究。
description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

notes: 製科所、機電所與自動化所合開

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 本課程為研究所熱流科學基礎課程之一，內容主要包括質量、動量與能量守恆方程式的推導，以及它們的解析與近似解，應用範圍包含非旋轉流、低雷諾數流以及高雷諾數(邊界層)流等等。
description.en: This course is one of the fundamental courses in the thermofluid sciences for graduate students. Based upon the concept of conservation, the equations of mass, momentum, and energy will be derived. This course will deal with solutions of these equations, both exact and approximate. The application of solutions includes irrotational flow, low Reynolds number flow, and high Reynolds number (boundary layer) flow, etc.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

name.zh: 兒童文學融入英語教學
name.en: Children's Literature and English Language Teaching

description.zh: 本課程針對幼稚園、國小、與國中階段的英語師資而設計，在教材與教法的搭配上提供學理的引介與實務上的訓練。本課程設計考量這些階段學生之身心發展程度與興趣，將屬於兒童與青少年文學範疇的文本（例如：希臘神話、哈利波特系列、波西傑克森系列等等）作創意運用，幫助老師們擷取並改編合宜的教材，經由活潑的教學活動（包括：改編戲劇演出、繪本製作、歌唱舞蹈等等），提高學生的英語能力，也在培養他們體察文化差異的深層素養。
description.en: Designed for kindergarten, elementary school, and junior high school English teacher, this course aims to provide practical training and theories in teaching materials and pedagogy. Students of this course will also learn to adapt children and teenager literary works such as Greek mythology, the Harry Potter series, and the Posey Jackson series into materials suitable for students at the above-specified age groups. Possible learning activities such as role-play, picture books, dancing/singing will also be explored as methods to both develop students' English proficiency and cultural awareness.

description.zh: 使用者導向之設計已成為大多數互動設計的依循主軸。他翻轉了以產品為導向的傳統，強調以使用者的偏好引領設計的價值。而這就是設計思考的方法導入互動設計中，利用其敏感性和方法，透過可行及可用的技術滿足使用者的需求，從而產生使用者價值並發展市場機會。研究建議，由世界級的設計公司IDEO所主導，設計思考與決策科學相結合，觸發了同理心設計與工程技術的融合。這不僅可以確保提出兼容實際性和創造性地問題解決方案外，而且在設計的開始便融入使用者導向的設計概念，將有助於創新設計與解決方案的提出。同時，在設計的初始階段導入資料應用與分析的方法，更能在設計中正確的整合敏感性，技術可行性，商轉可行性和使用者的需求。本課程主要的概念在於利用設計思考以使用者導向之設計方法，將使用者及其需求作為設計提案以及解決方案的啟始點，並整合分析設計對象，使用者所遭遇的問題，以及如何提高性能以及實現可擴展性等問題。並透過資料科學與工具的整合應用，導引資料分析人員與設計專業人員進行跨領域的整合，以建構未來設計創新的機會與願景。因此，本課程的主要目標是：1.建構以用戶為導向之人本設計重要設計流程。2.使用高品質的數據，可以創建設計工件，
description.en: As the user-center design is becoming the core of most interaction design (IxD), it has become a popular belief that it is no longer the product that leads but users and user preferences that's leading the game. This is where design thinking steps in, where IxD uses their sensibility and methods to match users' need in a way that is technologically feasible and viable enough to generate user value and tap market opportunity. Suggested by some studies, brought in vogue by the popular design firm IDEO, design thinking when combined with decision science results in an infusion of empathy with engineering. This not only ensures a practical and creative resolution of problems but also puts the user at the center of applications and at the starting point to develop new designs and solutions. Meanwhile, ensuring design in analytics projects from the initial stages can lead to the right blend of sensibility, technical feasibility, business viability, and consumer needs.The idea is, design th

description.zh: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性的相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。
description.en: The topics of this course include interactivity, and virtual experience, virtual community, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship.

name.zh: 使用者導向設計與跨專業合作創新
name.en: User Experience Design ＆ Interdisciplinary Collaborate Innovation

description.zh: Innovation Design Workshop (IDW)是UDDC華冑設計整合美國GE公司、IDEO公司、史丹佛大學、卡內基美隆大學、荷蘭飛利浦公司等學術與業務單位，應用於產品與服務創新上，一系列的「使用者情境體驗導向、跨專業合作創新」方法（User-Oriented Innovative Design Process and Disciplinary Innovation），以市場策略導向的「使用者情境體驗」工作營方法進行創意激盪，引領企業邁入前瞻性規劃，激發新產品與服務創新價值（Innovalue），帶動產業之永續創新。藉由跨領域團隊協同共融，從工作營中洞悉、觀察及體驗使用者需求，找尋創新脈絡及契機，以有紀律、有效率的方式，策略性的激發產品創新概念。使用者導向的情境體驗法，為21世紀知識經濟時代針對產品、設備及服務，以宏觀時空環境及微觀使用者生活型態、生活行為為導向，從事產品創新設計研發的方法。在產品、設備與服務系統設計開發前及過程中，以情境預演與觀察的方式，從使用者的角度，先行訂定產品策略、市場定位，界定使用者特質，思想模式及生活情境，進而以體驗設計模式，進行使用情境的預想、觀察、分析，並將設計構想透過情境模擬體驗，驗證所設計的產品、設備與服務，是否能真正符合消費者與使用群族的需求。我
description.en: Provide a great opportunity to practice interdisciplinary collaborative design in product innovation. Encourage more flexible design approach that creates new innovative product value (innovalue) and emerging market perspectives.Using「user-oriented innovative design process」into this collaborative practice, in order to develop a broader range of design concept directions.  Strategy Mapping & Positioning _ Competitor product analysisDesign Feature Attribute Mapping(Scope/Target User/Quantity/Product & Design Definition)

notes: 一教101；工設三四與日職創新所合開/創新創業課程

description.zh: 先修課程：光學。一、幾何光學   1.光學基本定律(3) 2.球面光學系統成像(3) 3.雷射光傳播特性(3) 4.光纖(6) 5.輻射度學與光度學(3)二、物理光學   1.光的電磁理論(3) 2.光波的疊加與分析(3) 3.光的干涉與干涉儀(6) 4.光學鍍膜(3) 5.光的繞射(6) 6.光的偏振(3) 7.晶體光學基礎(6)

notes: 計中電腦教室, PBL ,光電三四碩與電資外生合開

name.zh: 非線性光纖光學與應用

description.zh: 利用光纖來製造雷射與光放大器已經廣泛的應用在各領域，由於光纖具有小的纖核，且光在此介質傳播時，通常具有相當長的傳播距離，此外利用各種鎖模技術所產生的短脈衝或是藉由光放大器，使得在光纖中傳播的光具有相當高的功率或是峰值功率，因此許多非線性光學的現象在光纖中被產生，近來更種新穎的光纖包括利用微結構光纖或稱為光子晶體光纖被廣泛的應用，使得光纖所產生非線性效應更為顯著，本課程將介紹在光纖中各種非線性光學現象產生的原理與其應用。
description.en: Fiber laser and amplifier have been widely used in various fields.  Due to  its small core and relative long propagation length of fiber and relative large  power and peak power light source is used, that is generated from mode-locked technique and amplifier, various nonlinear optical phenomena can be observed through propagation of the fiber.  Recently, many novel optical fibers including the microstructured fiber or termed photonic crystal fiber are widely used to cause the advance of the generated nonlinear phenomena.  In this course, it will introduce the principle of the generated nonlinear effects and its applications.

description.zh: 修先課程：光學。 本課程利用傅氏轉換理論解釋繞射理論及光影像處理與光資訊處理技術，它包含：1.簡介 2.二維線性系統分析3.繞射理論 4.近場及遠場繞射5.透鏡之傅氏轉換與影像品質分析 6.影像系統之頻域分析7.空間濾波與光資訊處理 8.全像
description.en: This course illustrates the diffraction theory and techniques of image processing and optical information processing by using the methods of Fourier transform. It involves：1. Introduction2.Analysis of 2-D linear systems3.Diffraction theory 4.Fresnel and Fraunhofer diffraction5.Fourier transforming6.Frequency analysis of optical imaging properties of lenses 7.Spatial filtering and optical information processing8.Holography

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

name.zh: 專利侵害鑒定與專利爭訟專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Infringement Assessment and Patent Litigation

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局最新頒佈之「專利侵權判斷要點」為藍本，主要介紹專利侵權判斷流程、專利請求項之解釋、專利侵權之比對與判斷、均等論之限制事項。並輔以國內外案列閱讀與討論，也瞭解未來專利侵害之發展趨勢。
description.en: Based on "The Essential of Patent Infringement Assessment (2015)" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, this course will focus on critical topics, such as the procedure of patent infringement judgement, claims interpretation, comparing the properly interpreted claims to the accused devices, Doctrine of Equivalents and limitations on the Doctrine of Equivalents. Furthermore, through some Taiwan and U.S. infringement cases, participants will be familiar with the trend of patent infringement.

notes: 本課程邀請智財法官、學者等講授，與智財所合開

name.zh: 離岸風電之熱流與空氣動力學基礎
name.en: Foundation and Analysis of Thermo-Fluid and Aerodynamics on Offshore Wind Power

description.zh: 離岸風力發電是在海上建設風力發電廠，電廠通常建於大陸礁層(棚)，利用風能進行發電，它較陸上風力發電具有更高的風速，所以能提供更多的電力。面對全球溫室氣體減量趨勢與達成非核家園願景，政府已規劃2025年再生能源發電占比20％之政策目標，為達成此一政策目標，政府規劃以太陽光電及離岸風電作為主力，其中離岸風力原規劃於2025年累計達3 GW（10億瓦）。為了讓學生了解離岸風力發電熱流與空氣動力學之基本原理與應用，特別於大四與研究所共同合開這門課。本課程內容主要包括:(1)離岸風電簡介，(2)流體力學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(3)熱傳學分析基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(4)空氣動力學基礎與其應用於風機之分析，(5)電腦輔助離岸風機之氣動分析。
description.en: Offshore wind power is the use of wind farms constructed in bodies of water, usually in the ocean on the continental shelf, to harvest wind energy to generate electricity. Higher wind speeds are available offshore compared to on land, so offshore wind power’s electricity generation is higher per amount of capacity installed. In the face of the trend of global greenhouse gas reduction and the realization of the non-nuclear homeland vision, the government has planned a policy goal of renewable energy generation in the proportion of 20% in 2025. In order to achieve this policy goal, the government plans to use solar photovoltaic and offshore wind power as its main force. Among them, offshore wind power was originally planned to reach 3 GW (1 billion watts) in 2025. To assist students to understand the principle and application of thermo-fluid and aerodynamics on offshore wind power, this course is opened for seniors of undergraduate students and graduate students. The main content includ

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛製造課程包含車輛製造現場管理和車輛製造技術流程兩大部分，使學生了解整個汽車製造產業上的設備管理、量產管理和品質管理，以及汽車製造上所需的各種工藝技術，以觸發學生對汽車製造領域的興趣，進而擴大未來在汽車產業的服務機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the spot management and technical operation of vehicle manufacture. Students will understand the fields in facilities management, output management and quality control from this course. Furthermore, the aim of this course is to increase the students' interest and opportunity in the region of vehicle manufacture.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1)了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2)討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3)對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4)將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

name.zh: 循環經濟與高分子工業

description.zh: 循環經濟是一種與傳統線性經濟（開採-製造-丟棄）不同的產業經濟模式，循環經濟就像自然生態循環一樣，是封閉且循環的經濟系統，透過重新設計產品和商業模式，促進更好的能源與資源使用效率、消除廢棄物及避免污染自然環境。內容將包括發展及應用物質流分析及循環經濟的相關技術，先進材料的循環經濟議題及案例分析，不同高分子材料領域的循環經濟生態，及跨學科創造永續的解決辦法。
description.en: A circular economy is a regenerative system in which resource input and waste, emission, and energy leakage are minimised by slowing, closing, and narrowing material and energy loops. This can be achieved through long-lasting design, maintenance, repair, reuse, remanufacturing, refurbishing, and recycling. This is contrast to a linear economy which is a 'take, make, dispose' model of production. This course, further, contributes to the optimising systems rather than components, or the notion of ‘design for fit’. As a generic notion it draws from a number of more specific approaches including novel material, plastic, polymer, textile, and the cicular economy. Additional benefit to students is learning of Sustainable Development.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

name.zh: 電動車機電整合工程師能力培育
name.en: Training for Mechanical and Electrical Integration Engineer of Electric Vehicles

description.zh: 本課程之目的是協助學生考取經濟部專業工程師考試「電動車機電整合工程師能力鑑定」證照，課程內容依照考試科目內容，包含：電動車產業趨勢、各系統基礎原理、機電整合系統的重要元件、各子系統整合的基礎原理；電池技術概論及模組管理與電力安全防護系統、其他系統匹配、?輛動力系統性能設定、動力系統整合、微處理機與介面、電機機械原理、電機驅動原理。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to guide the student to pursue the certification of "Mechanical and Electrical Integration Engineer of Electric Vehicles" for professional engineers. That is provided by the Ministry of Economic Affairs. The contents are: trend of electric vehicle (EV) industry, principle of each system, key components of mechanical and electrical integration system, principle of system integration, battery concept and module management of electric safety, system matching, setting of vehicle powertrain, integration of powertrain, microprocessor and interface, principle of electromechanics, principle of electrical driving.

notes: 車輛大碩與產業接軌合開/週一234節，共12週

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。

Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前環境議題與強化有關環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。故本課程主要內容包括：一、緒論 二、環境決策 三、環境保護政策 四、永續發展 五、達到良好環境規劃與設計的可能途徑 六、環境規劃與設計的專業實務練習 七、結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of current environmental issues, and further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1.Introduction 2.Environmental decision-making 3.Environmental protection policy 4.Sustainable development 5.Alternative approaches to environmental planning and design. 6.Professional practice of environmental planning and design 7.Conclusions

description.zh: 本課程係以時間為軸，將台灣建築區分為七個文化期，依次概略介紹各文化期建築的一般特徵：(1) 臺灣建築史學史、分期及資料體系、(2) 史前建築：舊石器時代與新石器時代的建築、(3) 南島族群的建築：高山族的建築、(4) 南島族群的建築：平埔族的建築、(5) 荷西建築、(6) 漢式建築、(7) 清末洋式建築、(8) 日式建築、(9) 現代建築。
description.en: This course is based on historical development of architectures, actually Taiwan have seven cultural times, this course will introduce every topical of architectures, as followers：historical studies of Taiwan Architectures, early historical architecture, architectures of high mountain peoples, architectures of lower mountain peoples, architectures from Nederland and Spain, architectures from China, architectures from Europe, Japanese architectures, and modern architectures.

name.zh: 雷射醫學的基礎與臨床應用

description.zh: 雷射乃20世紀三大發明之一，醫用雷射更已廣泛地應用在各個醫學領域。本課程將涵蓋的範圍包括：1. 雷射基本原理；2. 雷射安全標準；3. 雷射與組織的作用關係；4. 雷射在醫學的各種應用；5. 雷射於牙周病的應用；6. 雷射於口腔外科的應用；7. 雷射應用於牙齒美白；8. 低能量雷射的各種應用；9. 雷射實機操作與臨床示範。
description.en: The laser is one of the three major items invented in 20th century.  Medical laser applications have been widely used in many fields.  This lecture will cover: 1. Laser Physics; 2. Safety Standards; 3. Laser-Tissue-Interaction; 4. Laser in Medical Applications; 5. Laser in Periodontology; 6. Laser in Oral Surgery; 7. Laser Assisted Bleaching; 8. Low Level Laser Therapy; 9. Practical Hands-on and Live Patient Demonstration.

Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

description.zh: 課程大綱規劃主要依據上述的四部份分別進行授課，包含固態氧化物燃料電池之原理應用及檢測、潔淨能源技術、變頻式高效率交流液體技術與生質能及敏化染料太陽能技術，分別敘述如下：  1.潔淨能源技術能源概論，非再生能源與再生能源的利用能源的有效變換，未來能源的  發展形態有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。本課程主要是探討燃料電池的製程技術與發展。   a. 燃料電池製程技術介紹(Introduction)    b. 電池效率與開路電壓(Efficiency and Open Circuit Voltage)    c. 操作燃料與電壓(Operational Fuel and Voltage)    d. 中子交換薄膜燃料電池(Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells)    e. 鹼性電解質燃料電池(Alkaline Electrolyte Fuel Cells)    f. 甲烷燃料電池(Direct Methanol Fuel Cells)    g. 中溫與高溫燃料電池(Medium and High Temperature Fuel Cells)   h. 燃料電池之燃料添加(Fuelling Fuel Cells)    i. 壓縮機、透平機、葉扇與?浦(Compressors, Turbines, Ejectors, Fans,   Blowers, and Pumps)    j. 燃料電池之動力輸送(Delivering Fuel Cell Power)    k. 燃料電池之系統分析(Fuel Cell Systems Analyzed)
description.en: This course clean energy covers the fundamentals and applications of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The fundamentals are introductory of the energy source principle and transfer mechanism of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The design and production technologies of the clean energy are introduced and discussed. The examples or other topics of clean energy applications and procedures as well as specifications of the testing are usually regardant in this introductory course.

description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

name.en: Principle and application of fuel cell

description.zh: 本課程由機械工程的角度出發，結合基礎電化學原理，介紹燃料電池的基本原理及種類，由最新市場發展現況導入，介紹燃料電池的發展歷史及最新現況，同時說明提升燃料電池效率及壽命的關鍵影響因素，結合實作方式深入了解燃料電池特性。
description.en: This course is based on the principle of mechanical engineering and electrochemical theory to introduce the basic principles and types of fuel cells. From the latest development in the global market, the course will introduce the fuel cell history and the latest products of fuel cells. The improvement of fuel cell efficiency and lifetime will be explained through   fundamental theory and experiments.

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: 機電所.製科所與機械自動外生班合開；限 20 人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：精實製造工程。介紹最新精實製造系統和實務工具，主題包括： 1.精實製造系統概論 2.價值溪流分析 3.快速更換 4.使用點 5.源流品質 6.團隊 7.全員生產維護 8.後拉式/及時/看板生產系統 9.單元小組製造
description.en: Introduction to modern issues in lean manufacturing systems and practice of lean tools. Topics include overview of lean manufacturing systems, value stream analysis, quick changeover (QCO), point of use storage (POU), quality at the source, teams, total productive maintenance, pull/just-in-time/Kanban, and cellular manufacturing.

notes: 限20人,11選3;製科所與機械自動外生班合開

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

description.zh: 本課程目的在建立大學生以自身專業，在社區社會責任實踐中的身體力行；藉由對原住民部落社區議題盤點，研擬對策，並在與部落族人溝通後，擬定包括：社會計畫、設施設計、營造計畫、執行措施等階段工作內容，之後親自著手進行計畫實踐。以利於培養學生博雅的品格、並體會專業社會服務的情操與體驗，開拓生命視野。
description.en: The purpose of this course is, to provide students to practice the social responsibility based on their expertise and to develop sentiments through these social services for aboriginal tribes. By means of inventory on issues in tribes, the social plan, facility plan, construction plan and executive plan would be drafted, and communicated with people, then be fulfilled by students themselves.

notes: 建築三四與建都所日職合開

description.zh: 本課程從組織在企業管理中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以組織設計與資源策略來探討公司經營的重要關鍵議題。課程內容包含外部環境、企業文化、組織設計、組織權力、組織政治、企業創新、資源整合策略。公司管理者學習後，面對多變化環境中，可做出最佳的組織經營決策。
description.en: The program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of organization design and resource strategy as they are used in a wide variety of settings in business. The topics covered in this course include: organization environment, organization culture, organization design, organization power, organization polices, organization innovation, and resource strategy. After taking the class, under the changeable environment, students should be able to make the best decisions of organization management.

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括：（1）生產策略（2）產品設計與規劃（3）製程設計與規劃（4）廠址選擇（5）產能規劃（6）資源需求規劃（7）品質管理（8）物料管理（9）存貨管制。
description.en: The course mainly includes following topics：（1）operation strategy, （2）products planning and designing, （3）process planning and designing,（4）location strategy, （5）capacity planning, （6）material requirement planning, （7）quality management, （8）material management,（9）inventory management.

description.zh: 公司治理在商業的過程中扮演核心角色，提供公司目標及策略上的協助並助其達成期望。也提供讓員工共事的價值觀即確保企業永續經營的收支平衡。在現階段競爭時代當中，本課程除提供同事專業知識外，並以此讓學生瞭解企業運作之道。 ◆公司治理定義與演進 ◆公司治理關鍵議題 ◆公司治理演進 ◆公司治理模式 ◆公司治理架構 ◆公司治理應用 ◆公司治理維持與發展。
description.en: Corporate governance is the combination of legal and political governance mechanisms external to the firm, along with monitoring and incentive governance mechanisms internal to the firm, linked and driven by the forces of investment markets, to produce value-increasing outcomes for firms' owners and, ultimately, society at large. In this course, we will survey corporate governance, taking the investor's point of view. By the end of the course, you should have a well-informed understanding of the basic corporate governance problem and the major issues in corporate governance, prominent proposed solutions to the corporate governance problem, the way the problem is actually addressed in a variety of companies and countries, and evidence on the prospects for and drawbacks of the various solutions. This course is therefore comprised of distinct intellectual components-the practice and the science-which are intertwined throughout the semester's activities.

description.zh: 本課程主要研討服務業的行銷與管理，主要內容包括：（1）服務分類（2）服務接觸（3）服務品質（4）服務業創新（5）服務失誤（6）服務補救（7）服務策略（8）顧客滿意（9）服務定價。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）service innovation, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）service pricing.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用3D繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 本課程將給學生從較廣義的風險管理範疇對風險值有一番認識與瞭解，主要包含以下三個部份：第一部份介紹風險值，將從近來風險管理的理論與實務發展討論其起源與基本觀念；第二部份說明衡量風險值的方法，包括變異數共變數法、歷史模擬、蒙地卡羅模擬及壓力測試；第三部份從風險值的觀點說明風險管理的相關議題，包括1) 決策法則，例如投資與避險法則。2) 信用風險。3)流動性、作業及法律風險。4)資本配置。5)企業風險管理。
description.en: This course gives students an overview of VaR, viewed in its broader risk management context. Totally, there will be three parts in this course. Part One is an introduction, which discusses the origins and basics of VaR in the context of recent developments in the theory and practice of risk management. Part Two deals with the approaches of measuring VaR, including variance-covariance approach, historical simulation, Mote Carlo simulation and stress testing. Part Three then deals with risk management issues from a VaR perspective, including 1) decision-making rules, such as investment and hedging rules; 2) credit risks; 3) liquidity, operational and legal risks; 4) capital allocation; 5) firm-wide risk management.

notes: 限本系碩二修讀，碩一及他系學生請找吳斯偉老師面談

The content includes:?Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate?Face Recognition?1000 Image Classification?9000 Object Detection?Autopilot simulation?Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms?Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)?Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)?Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)?Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)?Deep Reinforcement Learning

notes: 電子大四、電子所.電資外生所.產業接軌合開

description.zh: 使學生熟悉智慧電網原理等相關知識。訓練學生具備運用智慧電網基礎、設計、分析與研發的能力。培養學生了解智慧電網與永續能源原理、觀念、背景、議題、應用與未來發展，實際瞭解智慧電網系統之運作。授課內容為：基本電力系統、智慧電網與電網運轉簡介、電網通訊、電網數據分析基礎、分散式電網與能源系統、智慧電網市場運轉
description.en: Introduction to the field of Smart Grid. The course will provide students with a working knowledge of fundamentals, design, analysis, and development of Smart Grid. This course will present and discuss principles, concepts, contexts, issues, applications and future developments of Smart grids and sustainable Energy integration. The course topics covered: 1.	Basics of Power Systems;2.	Introduction to smart grid and power grid operation;3.	Power grid communication and networking;4.	Elements of power networks and data analysis;5.	Elements of distributed energy resources (DER) and grid integration;6.	Economics and Market Operations.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應、可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

name.en: Introduction to Theory and Applications in Wind Engineering

description.zh: 風工程是一個跨領域的學科，屬於研究所課程，適合已有良好工程力學以及流體力學基礎的學生選修。然而為了推廣我國工程師及土木系大學生了解此門學問，本課程設計為大四及研究所學生選修的先導型課程。本課程內容涵蓋大氣邊界層、鈍體空氣動力學以及空氣彈力學的基礎知識，進而闡述建築物耐風設計以及橋梁耐風設計的概念，配合我國以及國際上常用之耐風設計規範作為解說及練習，輔助學生對於風工程有一定的認識。其他如空氣污染擴散、通風節能減熱、計算流體力學應用等與風相關的主題，亦在本課程提出概略性的介紹以及發展現況。
description.en: Wind Engineering is a cross-disciplinary subject that belongs to the institute course and is suitable for students who have a good background in engineering mechanics and fluid mechanics. However, in order to promote the knowledge of Wind Engineering to engineers and civil engineering students, this course is designed as the precursor courses selected by seniors and graduate students. This course covers the basic knowledge of atmospheric boundary layer, bluff body aerodynamics and air-elasticity, and then expounds the wind-resistant design of buildings and the concept of wind-resistant design of bridges. name.zh: 十九世紀英國文學與文化

description.zh: 本課程以維多利亞時期主要作品的閱讀與討論，分析十九世紀英國的社會、文化與文學重要議題，包括城市化、工業化、功利主義、馬克思的革命思想、資產階級意識形態、女性處境、帝國主義、殖民主義、宗教與科學之爭、唯美主義、維多利亞時期的印刷業文化等。
description.en: This course aims to enable students, through intensive reading and discussion of representative works of Victorian literature, to achieve a critical awareness of social, cultural as well as literary issues crucial to the nineteenth century. Key issues and concepts introduced include: urbanization, industrialization, utilitarianism, Marx's idea of revolution, bourgeois ideology, the condition of women, imperialism, colonialism, aestheticism,religion and science,   and Victorian print culture.

description.en: Based on "The Essential of Patent Infringement Assessment (2015)" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, this course will focus on critical topics, such as the procedure of patent infringement judgement, claims interpretation, comparing the properly interpreted claims to the accused devices, Doctrine of Equivalents and limitations on the Doctrine of Equivalents. Furthermore, through some Taiwan and U.S. infringement cases, participants will be familiar with the trend of patent infringement.

name.zh: 創新、競爭與公平交易法
name.en: Innovation, Competition and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 公平交易法是經濟憲法，也是維持市場交易秩序的根本大法。當現代企業與市場的結構愈趨複雜，公平交易法的角色也愈顯重要。本課程將以案例分析，帶領學生了解公平交易法的基本原則。最後，本課程將規劃呈現科技發展下的新興議題，特別偏重科技產業的創新與競爭、數位經濟所帶來的新挑戰，帶領學生一起探討。
description.en: The Fair Trade Act is often considered as the economic constitution also a set of fundamental rules to maintain the order of market. This Act is getting more and more important in the modern economy while the market is getting more and more chaotic and complicated due to the technology advancement. This course is designed for students who intend to understand the principles of the Fair Trade Act both in books and in action, and who are interested to learn about the interplay of innovation and competition with particular emphasis on technology industries and digital economy.

name.zh: 專利資訊分析專題研究

description.zh: 近年來，經濟學家，社會科學研究人員，政策制定者，商人和專業人士已開始在中觀和宏觀層面上使用專利信息。這樣做是為了分析一個國家的國際化技術模式的專利活動;在某個部門，技術或公司中申請專利活動，以確定或預測技術變革的方向，或確定公司在市場中的相對技術地位;因此，專利信息的使用已經擴展到國家，機構或企業層面的許多不同的戰術和戰略業務，研究和政策制定活動。因此，本課程的主要目標 通過發表論文審查，重點關注幾個領域的專利信息分析。
description.en: In recent years, economists, social science researchers, policymakers, businessmen and professionals have begun to make increasing meso-level and macro-level use of patent information. This is being done to analyze, for example, patenting activities of a country' technical patterns of internationalization; patenting activities in a sector, technology or company to ascertain or forecast the direction of technical change, or ascertain the relative technological position of a company in a marketplace; etc. As such, the use of patent information has expanded to many different tactical and strategic business, research, and policy making activities at national, institutional or enterprise levels. Therefore, the primary objective of present course focus on patent information analysis in several areas through papers review.

(b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications. description.zh: 產品創新管理課程主要對象為有興趣從事企業產品創新發明機會或技能的學生們。此課程不僅介紹基礎發明工具而且提供課程上實際演練。主要內容包含如何辨識企業產品研發創新機會與問題；發現新點子；發展最適解答；展示創新成果與萃思方法介紹。課程上也會提出許多相關企業的應用實例討論。其目的在於幫助學生們學習了解創新工具與系統創新方法在產品創新管理的專業領域及利用課程上的產品研發創新工具或取更好的工作機會
description.en: Production Innovation Management course focuses on the particular interest to those students who are considering Production development of an innovative business opportunity or innovation management skills. This course not only discusses the basics toolkits for every innovator needs, but also provides the practice workshop of systematic innovation. Major topics include how to identifying the opportunity and problem of Production R&D; discover the new ideas; develop the solution; demonstrate the innovation; and the TRIZ works. Many of the examples will also be discussed in their entrepreneurial approaches to Production R&D innovation.    Objective: To develop an understanding of innovation toolkits and systematic innovation approach to help students making better understanding in Production R&D innovation management and equipping with the innovation skills needed to pursue a viable career option.

Topics include project management concepts, work breakdown structure, scheduling, budgeting and cost monitoring, financial analysis, risk assessment and monitoring, interface management and the art of leadership.

It can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

description.zh: 本課程內容以個體、團體與組織三層次為經，以行為基礎、激勵理論、個體決策、團體行為、團體決策、溝通理論、領導、權力與政治、組織設計、組織文化、組織變革與發展等相關議題為緯，探討組織相關之理論及管理實務。

description.en: This course begins with a brief introduction of ERP, followed by a comprehensive discussion on the system architecture, functions, and modules of ERP. Also covered in the course is the process of planning and introducing ERP in enterprises. Real-world cases of ERP and e-Business will be provided in the course.

It focuses on understanding the paradigm of theoretical fundamental of Adult & Continuour Education in general. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream methods practiced in Technological Education field.

description.en: This course is divided into two semesters. It introduces how to use financial operations to define and describe clearly the algorithm, and then uses R language, XQ, or MultiChart to simulate and execute. Contents include: Introduction to program trading, trading strategy development, backtesting, and fund management.In additions, this course invites the SysJust company to serve as a professional mentor. SysJust company is the largest financial information software company in Taiwan. Its industry lecturer will lead students to contact the XQ trading system and write XS grammar for financial trading.

This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.

description.zh: 本課程為沿續教育統計學（一）課程，探討教育問題進階研究，所需之統計理論與方法。課程內容含卡方檢定法、多因子變異數分析、趨向分析、共變數分析、因素分析及無母數統計考驗等。
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course contains include Chi-square techniques, multivariate analysis of variance, trend analysis, covariance analysis, factor analysis and nonparametric tests.

description.zh: 1.光纖感測介紹，2.光纖感測元件，3.光纖感測系統，4.光纖感測多工技術，5.光纖雷射感測系統，6.長距離光纖感測系統，7.大範圍多點光纖感測系統，8.光纖感測網路。
description.en: 1. Introduction to fiber optic sensor, 2. Fiber sensor devices, 3. Fiber sensor systems, 4. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques, 5. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems, 6. Long-distance fiber sensor systems, 7. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems, 8. Fiber sensor networks.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality. In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study. The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

description.zh: 機器學習探討如何能由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能自動增進其處理效能。例如進行預測，特徵擷取，分類，模式辨認，決策，各種訊號處理，甚至建立人工智慧等等。本課程將介紹機器學習的基礎演算法、理論及工具。並讓學生嘗試在各種領域中實際實踐這些技術。課程內容包括：(a) 監督式學習（例如參數和非參數演算法、支持向量機和類神經網路等），(b) 無監督學習（例如群聚、降維和深度學習等）與 (c) 機器學習應用實例（例如語音信號處理，影像訊號處理，音訊訊號處理與自然語言處理，資訊擷取與資料搜尋等）。
description.en: Machine learning studies how to automatically learn from observed data to improve the performance of prediction, information extraction, clustering, pattern recognition, decision making, signal processing and even artificial intelligence. This course will introduce fundamental algorithms, theories and their practical applications. The content will cover (a) supervised learning, such as parametric and non-parametric algorithms, super vector machines and neural networks, (b) unsupervised learning, for example, data clustering, dimension reduction and deep learning and (c) practical applications on speech, image, audio signal and natural language processing or information retrieval and search, etc.

notes: 電子大三大四與電子所合開

name.zh: 專題討論-生化與生醫工程組

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

notes: 化工博班生化組；與生化所合開

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 智慧手機、智慧車、智慧家電、智慧電網、智慧化控制系統等，一場科技革命正熱鬧展開。看似單一產品的創新，背後其實有著更大的驅動力，那就是當行動通訊與網際網路結合後，催生出來的Mobile Internet新領域，所有資料都上網、所有物品都連網、所有人都掛網，個人到企業都必須做好準備。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解行動運算的應用，與跨入3G最新手機開發平台，培養未來開發手機程式設計之技術實力，使學生具備獨立開發手機應用程式的能力。
description.en: This is an introduction course of mobile computing. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of mobile technology; and applications, 2. Location-based service 3. Could-based computing 4. Mobile applications; 5. Mobile programming

notes: IMBA.IMFI與資財所合開；計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程教導及訓練研究生有關英文在管理領域內特定專題的溝通運用，學生將在本課程中以英文學習: (1)管理常見之專有名詞，(2)英語備忘錄的草擬與撰寫，(3)會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備與撰寫，(4)企業計劃書的編寫，及(5)現代化全球管理相關專題英文資料的閱讀與溝通討論。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文做報告與其它同學討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the communication in English on the special topics within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Terminologies commonly used in management; (2) Draft and write-up of English memorandum; (3) Development of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (4) Business proposals and plans; and (6) Contemporary topics and trend in global management issues. Students will be required to make group presentations and discussions on the selected management topics in English.

notes: 本系碩班學生限碩二修讀，碩一學生欲修讀請先洽系辦

name.zh: 創新講座-創意與創新思維(三)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

notes: 2/18-4/18，上6週/每週3小時/，工設四與創新所合開/

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的在於教授都市設計的基本分析理論與方法，除透過課堂案例的介紹與討論外，學生還將以分組方式進行觀察研究與運算分析。案例介紹與討論之重點在於認識影響都市空間環境品質的關鍵要素，而分組研究之目的則在於讓學生藉由各種現場觀察與數位分析工具的應用，進一步探索這些關鍵要素在都市空間形構過程的交互影響過程。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to key theoretical and methodological approaches in urban design. The main content will be delivered through a series of case study discussion and project-based research practice. In specific, the case study is to review and identify key factors shaping the physical environment of cities; while through collaborative research projects, students are expected to engage in a step-by-step process of on-site observation and computational analysis, examining how the factors are interacting with each other.

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

notes: 車輛所.能源所與能源車輛外生班合開

name.en: Special Topics on Sustainable and Resilient Cities

description.zh: 該課程將研究在全球化與氣候變化下的永續與韌性城市發展策略；內容包括永續城市、創意城市、智慧城市、宜居城市、全球城市和後工業城市的各種概念。課程將引導學生參與學術性討論和永續與韌性的城市發展實務理解；提供在不同經濟、體制和文化環境下，探索其規劃政策和設計概念，並以實際案例借鑒不同城市之韌性的回復力規劃，以及說明如何促進城市韌性回復能力，減少社會失序和提高當地應變災害能力的積極策略，因此課程的目標包括讓學生參與永續城市發展的學術討論和韌性城市實踐方法，發展相關知識與了解促進韌性城市和永續性的國際實踐案例，期能將這些概念和經驗應用於規劃設計所需的研究和技能。
description.en: The course will examine strategies for sustainable and resilient urban development in the globalization and climate change. It will engage students in academic discussions and the practice of sustainable and resilient development. Planning policies and design concepts will be explored in different economic, institutional and cultural environments. Case studies draw on best practices in urban resilience planning in different cities, and will illustrate positive strategies to promote urban resilience, reduce social disruption, and improve local ability to deal with pressure. The objectives are to engage students in sustainable urban development, develop knowledge and understand good international practices that promote urban resilience and sustainability, and develop the research and skills necessary to apply these concepts and ideas to actual planning projects.

notes: 建都所日職與設計所合開

name.en: Special Topics on Sustainable and Resilient Cities

description.zh: 該課程將研究在全球化與氣候變化下的永續與韌性城市發展策略；內容包括永續城市、創意城市、智慧城市、宜居城市、全球城市和後工業城市的各種概念。課程將引導學生參與學術性討論和永續與韌性的城市發展實務理解；提供在不同經濟、體制和文化環境下，探索其規劃政策和設計概念，並以實際案例借鑒不同城市之韌性的回復力規劃，以及說明如何促進城市韌性回復能力，減少社會失序和提高當地應變災害能力的積極策略，因此課程的目標包括讓學生參與永續城市發展的學術討論和韌性城市實踐方法，發展相關知識與了解促進韌性城市和永續性的國際實踐案例，期能將這些概念和經驗應用於規劃設計所需的研究和技能。
description.en: The course will examine strategies for sustainable and resilient urban development in the globalization and climate change. It will engage students in academic discussions and the practice of sustainable and resilient development. Planning policies and design concepts will be explored in different economic, institutional and cultural environments. Case studies draw on best practices in urban resilience planning in different cities, and will illustrate positive strategies to promote urban resilience, reduce social disruption, and improve local ability to deal with pressure. The objectives are to engage students in sustainable urban development, develop knowledge and understand good international practices that promote urban resilience and sustainability, and develop the research and skills necessary to apply these concepts and ideas to actual planning projects.

description.zh: 本課程除了讓學生透過論文閱讀與評析增進自我的評判技巧之外，也將透過數位學習相關國際研討會、國際期刊的審查標準來了解專家審查時所注意的面向。
description.en: The course is designed to assist students not only to enhance their criteria of reviewing articles, but also to understand the experts’ review standards in e-learning related international conferences and Journals.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.基礎物理光學2.超音波簡介3.雷射超音波的生成4.雷射超音波的偵測5.刀鋒邊緣技術6.雙頻干涉儀7.費里裴洛干涉儀8.非線性晶體干涉儀9.雷射超音波技術於非破壞檢測之應用10.雷射超音波技術於材料性質量測之應用11.雷射超音波技術發展的未來趨勢
description.en: 1.Introduction to physical optics, 2.Introduction to ultrasonic waves, 3.Optical generation of ultrasound waves, 4.Detection of ultrasonic waves with optical methods, 5.Knife edge technique, 6.Hetrodyne interferometers in LUT, 7.Fabry-Perot interferometers, 8.Two-way mixing interferometers, 9.Application of LUT in nondestructive testing, 10.Application of LUT to material characterizations, 11.Future trend of LUT.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對為兒童設計或評估互動產品設計的學生，研究者和產品設計開發人員而開設。課程涵蓋了如何進行觀察與評估兒童使用的產品，系統，與軟體介面使用等程序，包含了開發玩具，遊戲和專用設備在互動設計上的評估方法。這個領域包含了關於互動設計和可用性工程（UE）等更專業領域的大量知識。在這個實踐領域以及HCI的相關研究領域中，有許多方法可用於評估兒童互動產品。本課程針對兒童互動產品設計上，提供了一個新的和充滿活力的研究領域的概述，並揭示了未來研究必須解決的當前方法學與產品設計間的差距，課程中我們也希望學生能夠對這個研究領域產生熱情，因為那裡有很多有趣的工作正在進行，也有許多研究有待未來的設計者去實踐與研究。
description.en: This course is for students, researchers, and practitioners who design or evaluate interactive products for children. It covers evaluation methodology for supporting interaction design for products, systems, software applications, toys, games, and specialized appliances intended to be used by children. This field contains a substantial body of knowledge with regard to interaction design and the more narrowly scoped field of usability engineering (UE). Within these areas of practice, and the related research field of HCI, a host of methods are available for evaluating interactive products for children. This course provides an overview of a new and vibrant research field and exposes gaps in current methodologies that future research must address. We also hope it conveys our enthusiasm for this research area, where so much interesting work is taking place and so much still needs to be done.

notes: 創新所.互動所與互動外生班合開(外加)

description.zh: 管理會計是整理和產生各種會計資料和情報以幫助各階層的管理人員完成管理任務。本課程共分三篇，第一篇是會計資料與企業決策之間的關係，其中共有五章分別介紹決策步驟與收集資料及選擇資料的近代會計方法論。第二篇是如何運用各項資料於企業決策，其至中包括四章，針對各項，各種特殊型態的決策需求，找出所需各項資料。第三篇是有關決策系統之各項計畫與控制制度，其中各章針對決策資料如何實用化與協調化。全文強調有關會計人員、經濟人員及財務人員皆可透過本書各項功能而達到分析與管理目的。
description.en: Management Accounting: Management Accounting is used to produce Accounting Information to help manager accomplishing managerial missions. In this Course, there are three subjects as follows: 1) The relationship between Accounting information and Business Decisions. 2) How to apply all types of information into Decision Model. 3) The planning and controlling of managerial decision will also be discussed, and 4) Case study.

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

name.en: Design and Practice of Integrated Circuit Layout

description.zh: 本課程將介紹layout(佈局)和先進製程的密切關係，從佈局設計流程之基本觀念及 EDA 軟體的使用到更深入探討 layout 的架構設計和先進製程中layout遇到的瓶頸和困難；課程內將教授並探討不同實務架構的layout問題和解決方法，其中包含標準電路元件(Standard cell)、記憶體 (Memory) 、類比暨混合信號 (Analog and mixed signal)，最後透過本課程的期末報告練習，可了解實務界中layout design的挑戰和對未來先進製程的重要性並提升學生往後在業界的競爭力。
description.en: Integrated circuit (IC) layout design plays a big role in the current semiconductor industry, especially for the most advanced technology. This course explores the big task of IC layout design and the practical problems with solutions in different layout fields, such as standard cell design, memory design, analog design, and mixed-signal field. This course introduces the students to the process, tools, and methodology of IC layout design. Moreover, it also provides the students with the insight into the exciting field of semiconductor technology and electronic devices. By going through the final project and competition, students will be brought to the next level of layout field and will have a wider vision to realize IC layout design.

notes: 電機所.電子系與產業接軌合開

description.zh: 學術論文簡報的能力是學術專業人員所必備的專業知能，以清楚簡明的方法傳遞專業科學的內容，需要報告者展現清楚的語言溝通能力。而本課程即是在培養學生具備在國際會議場合上進行學術論文簡報的能力。課程內容包括：優化學生英文基本能力、熟悉學術英文簡報的架構、學習使用資料視覺化傳遞科學研究發現，以及建立個人簡報風格等循序開展。修課學生需要具備基本的英文能力，並具備閱讀英文撰寫之學術報告的能力。學期間授課教師以講授法與小組合作介紹學術論文簡報的架構、製作學術論文簡報的注意事項、介紹常用之學術英文表現句型，並帶領學生每週撰寫一篇10分鐘的英文演說稿，最後學生以英文進行個人學術論文簡報作為最終考核的成果。
description.en: In today's international scientific community, an academic professional is required to present his/her scientific works in a professional manner in English. It is necessary that a scientist can deliver his/her own idea in a clear and precise language.  This course is designed to prepare the students with the ability doing academic presentation in an international conference. The contents of this course include the improvement of students' English proficiency, the introduction of the academic presentation format, and the delivery of key findings by using data visualization skills.  It is required that the students should have basic English capacity and can read a scientific report written in English.  The course material would be delivered by the instructor through weekly class literature and the team work projects. By the end of semester, the students would know the popular sentences used to express their result findings. The students would also learn how to make their own academic p

description.zh: 本課程之目的主要在於介紹運用機電科技與互動設計之整合應用，特別針對互動裝置及互動系統中所需之輸入裝置、輸出裝置、控制裝置及機構裝置之設計。其中輸入裝置包括感測器, 攝影裝置等，輸出裝置包括馬達、驅動器、致動器、LED顯示裝置等，控制裝置包括各型控制器，如Arduino, Basic Stamp等，機構裝置包括可動件與介互動操作模式以及搭配不同材料所產生之互動效果。本課程透過學生分組構思出不同的機電與設計之整合創意，並實作出互動裝置，特別著重在跳脫原本機電科技的用途，進而賦予新的應用的可能性。
description.en: This course is an attempt to introduce the application of mechatronic technology and interactive design, especially the design of input and output, control, and mechanical devices the interactive system needs. Input device contains image sensor and camera, while output device include motor, driver, actuator, and LED display. Control device include various controllers such as Arduino and Basic Stamp. Mechanical device include portable and interactive mode and the interactions resulted from different materials. Students will be asked to come up with different mechatronics designs and create a real interactive device to differentiate from the conventional usage of mechtronic technology which would create a new possibility.

name.zh: 設計思考：創意與創新策略

description.zh: 本課程提供學生一個與實務界交流的平台，協助學生體驗創意設計與創新策略的最佳實務。課程內容包括設計思考、創新品牌、設計觀察與創新流程等專題講座，和創意設計組織與設計公司等實地參觀見習。
description.en: This course is to provide with a platform on which students can experience the best practice of creative & innovation. The contents include of design thinking, Brand in innovation, observation and innovation process, as well as study tours of creative design organizations, and design agents.
